description: Zulu Republic is an ecosystem of blockchain tools and platforms, designed as a place for people, businesses, and organizations to thrive. Our mission is to promote the advancement in the development of decentralized technologies, while promoting human rights and empowerment around the globe, and also to reduce the division in this global digital world. The headquarter for Zulu Republic is in Zug, Switzerland, otherwise also known as Crypto Valley. However, the team structure is decentralized where many of them are collaborates from around the globe. Zulu Republic also have a dedicated Litecoin division, which includes the Litevault and Lite.im platforms.
name: Zulu Republic Token
